description: Provides a list of a trial's properties.

parameters.name: TrialName
parameters.description: The name of the trial to describe.

nested_items.name: TrialName
nested_items.description: The name of the trial.

nested_items.name: TrialArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trial.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The name of the trial as displayed. If DisplayName isn't specified, TrialName is displayed.

nested_items.name: ExperimentName
nested_items.description: The name of the experiment the trial is part of.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The source job type.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the trial was created.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Who created the trial.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: When the trial was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Who last modified the trial.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: MetadataProperties
nested_items.description: Metadata properties of the tracking entity, trial, or trial component.

nested_items.name: CommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID.

nested_items.name: Repository
nested_items.description: The repository.

nested_items.name: GeneratedBy
nested_items.description: The entity this entity was generated by.

nested_items.name: ProjectId
nested_items.description: The project ID.
